Values: Should be a folder listed in the configuration ``atlite: cutouts:`` (e.g. 'europe-2013-era5') or reference an existing folder in the directory ``cutouts``. Source module can be ERA5 or SARAH-2.
Description: Specifies the directory where the relevant weather data ist stored that is specified at ``atlite/cutouts`` configuration. Both ``sarah`` and ``era5`` work.
Specifies the solar panel technology and its characteristic attributes.

Values: use either {latitude_optimal} or options such {slope: 0, azimuth: 180}
Atlite function which returns for every raster the optimal slope and azimuth

Description: Specifies the tilt angle (or slope) of the solar panel. A slope of zero corresponds to the face of the panel aiming directly overhead. A positive tilt angle steers the panel towards the equator.
Specifies the `azimuth <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Azimuth>`_ orientation of the solar panel. South corresponds to 180.°.
Allowable density of solar panel placement. Value relates to socio-technical acceptable density.
A correction factor for the capacity factor (availability) time series.

Values: Any subset of the `Copernicus Land Cover code list <https://land.copernicus.eu/pan-european/corine-land-cover/clc2018>`_
Description: Specifies areas based on CLC which generally eligible for AC-connected offshore wind turbine placement.
(Optional) Distance to reserve as uneligible area around 'distance_grid_codes' for the renewable technology.

Values: (Optional with 'distance') Any subset of the `Copernicus Land Cover code list <https://land.copernicus.eu/pan-european/corine-land-cover/clc2018>`_
Description: Specifies from which a distance of 'distance' metres is unavailable as a buffer area.
Switch to exclude `Natura 2000 <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Natura_2000>`_ natural protection areas. Area is excluded if ``true``.
Method to compute the maximal installable potential for a node; confer :ref:`renewableprofiles`
To avoid too small values in the renewables` per-unit availability time series values below this threshold are set to zero.
Use all availabe weather cells for renewable profile and potential generation. The default ignores weather cells where only less than 1 MW can be installed.
